options.content: Percona Monitoring and Management

**Overview**  
[Percona Monitoring and Management (PMM)](https://www.percona.com/pmm) is a free and open-source platform for managing and monitoring MySQL and MongoDB performance, and provides time-based analysis to ensure that your data works as efficiently as possible. 

**Documentation**  
Please consult the official [PMM documentation](https://www.percona.com/doc/percona-monitoring-and-management/2.x/index.html) to learn more about PMM. Also of interest are the [Release notes](https://www.percona.com/doc/percona-monitoring-and-management/2.x/release-notes/index.html) and [FAQ](https://www.percona.com/doc/percona-monitoring-and-management/2.x/faq.html) for common questions about PMM.

**Community and Blogs**  
On the [PMM Community Forums](https://www.percona.com/forums/questions-discussions/percona-monitoring-and-management) you will find help from Perconians and the Community at large.  Further, we publish PMM announcements and use cases regularly on the [Percona Database Performance Blog](https://www.percona.com/blog/)  

**Get Help from Percona**  
Are you looking for assistance that comes with a response-time guarantee? Let our [Support team](https://www.percona.com/services/support?utm_source=pmm&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=support_link)  help you!
Already a customer? Log in to your [Percona Support Portal](https://customers.percona.com)

panels.description: Display the number of database security checks that the Security Threat Tool identified as failed during its most recent run.
panels.title: Failed security checks

targets.expr: avg by () ((sum by (node_name,cpu) ( (clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]),1)) or  (clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]),1)) ))*100 or sum by () (avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!="idle", mode!="total",mode!="idle",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) or avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!="idle",mode!="total",mode!="idle",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])))

sum(rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name",device!="lo",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) 
or irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name",device!="lo",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) 
or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) 
or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]))
+
sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name",device!="lo",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) 
or irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name",device!="lo",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])
or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) 
or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]))

sum by () (max_over_time(mysql_global_status_threads_connected{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{node_name=~"$node_name",state="current",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) or
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(pg_stat_database_numbackends{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval])))

sum by () (
(rate(mysql_global_status_queries{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) or 
irate(mysql_global_status_queries{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])) or 
(rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{node_name=~"$node_name",type!="command",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{node_name=~"$node_name",type!="command",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])) or
((rate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) + 
rate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])) or
(irate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) + 
irate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])))
)

avg(((clamp_max(avg by (node_name) (sum by (node_name,cpu) ( (clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait"}[5m]),1)) )),1) *100 or
sum by (node_name) (avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!="idle", mode!="total"}[$interval]) or avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!="idle", mode!="total"}[5m]))) * on(node_name) group_left(environment) avg by (node_name, environment) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external-exporter.*"})) * on(node_name) group_left(environment) avg by (node_name, environment) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external-exporter.*",environment=~"$environment"}))

avg((((node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{node_name=~"$node_name"} or (node_memory_MemFree_bytes{node_name=~"$node_name"} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{node_name=~"$node_name"} + node_memory_Cached_bytes{node_name=~"$node_name"})) / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{node_name=~"$node_name"} or
(rdsosmetrics_memory_free{node_name=~"$node_name"} + rdsosmetrics_memory_buffers{node_name=~"$node_name"} + rdsosmetrics_memory_cached{node_name=~"$node_name"})/ rdsosmetrics_memory_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}) * 100) * on(node_name) group_left(environment) avg by (node_name, environment) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external-exporter.*",environment=~"$environment"}))

avg(((rate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) or sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) * 1024) * on(node_name) group_left(environment) avg by (node_name, environment) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external-exporter.*",environment=~"$environment"}))

avg(((rate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) or
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) * 1024)  * on(node_name) group_left(environment) avg by (node_name, environment) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external-exporter.*",environment=~"$environment"}))

avg(((sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval]) or
irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) + 
(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))))  * on(node_name) group_left(environment) avg by (node_name, environment)(up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external-exporter.*",environment=~"$environment"}))

sum((sum by(node_name)(max_over_time(mysql_global_status_threads_connected{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
label_replace(mysql_global_status_threads_connected{node_name=~"$node_name",node_type="remote"},"node_name","pmm-server","","") or
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{node_name=~"$node_name",state="current"}[$interval]) or
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(pg_stat_database_numbackends{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]))))  * on(node_name) group_left(environment) avg by (node_name, environment)(up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external-exporter.*",environment=~"$environment"}))

sum((sum by (node_name) (
(rate(mysql_global_status_queries{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mysql_global_status_queries{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) or 
(sum by (node_name) (rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{node_name=~"$node_name",type!="command"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{node_name=~"$node_name",type!="command"}[5m]))) or
(sum by (node_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) + 
rate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (node_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) + 
irate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))
))  * on(node_name) group_left(environment) avg by (node_name, environment)(up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external-exporter.*",environment=~"$environment"}))

sum(((count by (node_name) (node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode=~"user"}) or (1-absent(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode=~"user"}))) + 
sum by (node_name) (rdsosmetrics_General_numVCPUs{node_name=~"$node_name"} or up * 0)) * on(node_name) group_left(environment) avg by (node_name, environment)(up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external-exporter.*",environment=~"$environment"}))

(sum by (service_name) (
(rate(mysql_global_status_queries{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mysql_global_status_queries{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])) or 
(sum by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{node_name=~"$node_name",type!="command",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (service_name) (irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{node_name=~"$node_name",type!="command",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]))) or
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) + 
rate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) + 
irate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])))
))

((clamp_max(avg by (node_name) (sum by (node_name,cpu) ( (clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait"}[5m]),1)) )),1) *100 or
sum by (node_name) (avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!="idle", mode!="total"}[$interval]) or avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!="idle", mode!="total"}[5m]))) * on(node_name) group_left(environment) avg by (node_name, environment) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql",job=~".*_hr-.*"})) * on(node_name) group_left(environment,service_name) avg by (service_name, node_name, environment) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external.*",environment=~"$environment"})

((rate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) or sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) * 1024) * on(node_name) group_left(environment,service_name) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|external.*",environment=~"$environment"})

((rate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) or
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) * 1024)  * on(node_name) group_left(environment,service_name) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external.*",environment=~"$environment"})

((sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval]) or
irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) + 
(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])) or

sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))))  * on(node_name) group_left(environment,service_name) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external.*",environment=~"$environment"})

((count by (node_name) (node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode=~"user"}) or (1-absent(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode=~"user"}))) + 
sum by (node_name) (rdsosmetrics_General_numVCPUs{node_name=~"$node_name"} or up * 0)) * on(node_name) group_left(environment,service_name) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external.*",environment=~"$environment"})

(sum by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{node_name=~"$node_name",type!="command",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (service_name) (irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{node_name=~"$node_name",type!="command",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]))) or
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) + 
rate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) + 
irate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])))
))

((clamp_max(avg by (node_name) (sum by (node_name,cpu) ( (clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait"}[5m]),1)) )),1) *100 or
sum by (node_name) (avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!="idle", mode!="total"}[$interval]) or avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!="idle", mode!="total"}[5m]))) * on(node_name) group_left(environment) avg by (node_name, environment) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql",job=~".*_hr-.*"})) * on(node_name) group_left(environment,service_name) avg by (service_name, node_name, environment) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external.*",environment=~"$environment"})

((rate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) or sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) * 1024) * on(node_name) group_left(environment,service_name) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|external.*",environment=~"$environment"})

((rate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) or
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) * 1024)  * on(node_name) group_left(environment,service_name) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external.*",environment=~"$environment"})

((sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval]) or
irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) + 
(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))))  * on(node_name) group_left(environment,service_name) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external.*",environment=~"$environment"})

((count by (node_name) (node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode=~"user"}) or (1-absent(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode=~"user"}))) + 
sum by (node_name) (rdsosmetrics_General_numVCPUs{node_name=~"$node_name"} or up * 0)) * on(node_name) group_left(environment,service_name) (up{node_name=~"$node_name",service_type=~"mysql|mongodb|postgresql|proxysql|haproxy|external",job=~".*_hr-.*|^external.*",environment=~"$environment"})
